description: Sophisticated scam where scammer claims victim is eligible for income tax refund but needs to pay processing fee or verify details first.

turns.scammer_message:
Subject: Income Tax Refund Approved - Rs.47,850

Dear Taxpayer, Your ITR for AY 2024-25 has been processed. You are eligible for refund of Rs.47,850. Click here to claim: [LINK] - Income Tax Department, Govt of India

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: hello beta... i got msg for tax refund of 47850 rs... i am trying to click link but my phone is hanging and nothing is opening... i am retired school teacher pushpa here... pls help me how to get this money i dont understand phone things much

turns.scammer_message: Good afternoon, I am Rajesh Sharma, Income Tax Officer, CPC Bengaluru. Your refund is approved but we need to verify your bank account details. Please confirm your PAN number and account where refund should be credited.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: namaste rajesh sir... thank you for helping me... i found my passbook... my account number is 9064061039680418... and pan number is CQLPF9201U... hope this is correct... sir do i have to pay any verification fee or tax for this?? pls guide me beta i dont want any trouble with govt...

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for confirmation. For refund processing, there is mandatory verification fee Rs.499 (refundable). Pay to Income Tax e-Payment gateway: tax.refund.verify@paytm. This is one-time RBI mandated charge.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: ok sir i will pay 499 rs right now... i am trying on my gpay app... i typed teh id tax.refund.verify@paytm... but sir waht name should show on screen?? i want to check before clicking pay... i am scared if money goes to wrong person... pls tell me exact name so i can confirm it is govt account...

turns.scammer_message: Alternatively, pay verification fee via NEFT to Account Number: 11223344556677, IFSC Code: ICIC0001122, Name: Income Tax Refund Processing Cell. Your refund Rs.47,850 will be credited within 24 hours after verification.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: rajesh sir neft is asking too many things... i am old lady my eyes are hurting typing so much numbers... now my bank app is asking for beneficiary mobile number to add account... what number should i put sir?? pls tell fast i want to finish this process and get my refund...

turns.scammer_message: For faster processing, you may also complete verification on our secure portal: https://incometax-refund-portal.in/verify Enter your PAN, Aadhaar and pay Rs.499. For technical support call 8800112233.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: banking_fraud | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: panicked
api_response.agentResponse: rajesh beta link is not opening... showing error... thank god you gave number... i will call you on 8800112233... oh wait my son just rang doorbell... i have to go open door... i will try to call you later ok?? sorry beta have to go...

turns.scammer_message: Please note: This refund approval expires in 48 hours as per IT Act Section 143(1). After expiry, you'll need to file rectification request which takes 6-8 months. Email payment proof to itrefund.verification@gmail.com immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: cautious
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god 8 months?? no no beta i need money for my medicines... sorry i went to door it was just courier boy... i am back now... i am trying the paytm id again... tax.refund.verify@paytm... but sir when i verify it shows a name... is it your name rajesh sharma or govt name?? pls confirm teh name so i can click pay... i am shaking i dont want to do mistake...
